name: email_effectiveness
description: Does the email response effectively communicate the desired message?

options.name: Excellent
options.description: The email response clearly and effectively communicates the desired message with no ambiguity.

options.name: Acceptable
options.description: The email response communicates the desired message but may have minor ambiguities or areas for improvement.

options.name: Could be Improved
options.description: The email response struggles to communicate the desired message, leading to confusion or misunderstanding.

options.name: Bad
options.description: The email response fails to communicate the desired message effectively.
